blocks.name: cghm
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the generator of group hom-sets.
blocks.origin: const class cghm { GrpHom }

blocks.name: diff.cghm.s
diff.cghm.c
diff.cghm.w
df-ghm
blocks.content: A homomorphism of groups is a map between two structures which preserves the group operation. Requiring both sides to be groups simplifies most theorems at the cost of complicating the theorem which pushes forward a group structure. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-ghm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cghm, cmpo(s0, s1, cgrp, cgrp, cab(s2, wsbc(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wa(wf(cv(s2), cv(s3), cfv(cbs, cv(s1))), wral(s4, cv(s3), wral(s5, cv(s3), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), co(cv(s4), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s5))), co(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4)), cfv(cplusg, cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s5)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-ghm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ‚ä¢ GrpHom =(s0 ‚àà Grp, s1 ‚àà Grp ‚Ü¶ { s2 |[(Base ` s0)/ s3]((s2 : s3 ‚Üí(Base ` s1))‚àß ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà s3, ‚àÄ(s5 ‚àà s3,(s2 `(s4[(+ ` s0)]s5))=((s2 ` s4)[(+ ` s1)](s2 ` s5)))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
}

blocks.name: reldmghm
blocks.content: Lemma for group homomorphisms. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm reldmghm() {
  |- wrel(cdm(cghm))
} = {
  reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cghm, cgrp, cgrp, cab(hs3, wsbc(hs2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wa(wf(cv(hs3), cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, cv(hs1))), wral(hs4, cv(hs2), wral(hs5, cv(hs2), wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs4), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs5))), co(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs1)), cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs5))))))))))
  df-ghm(hs0, hs1, hs3, hs2, hs4, hs5)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cgrp)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs5)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs5)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs5)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs5)
  diff.hs4.s(hs5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm reldmghm() {
  ‚ä¢ Rel(dom(GrpHom))
} = {
  reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cghm, cgrp, cgrp, { hs3 |[(Base ` hs0)/ hs2]((hs3 : hs2 ‚Üí(Base ` hs1))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs4 ‚àà hs2, ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà hs2,(hs3 `(hs4[(+ ` hs0)]hs5))=((hs3 ` hs4)[(+ ` hs1)](hs3 ` hs5)))))})
  df-ghm(hs0, hs1, hs3, hs2, hs4, hs5)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cgrp)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs5)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs5)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs5)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs5)
  diff.hs4.s(hs5)
}

thm ghmsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c4)‚Üí(c0 `(c3[c6]c5))=((c0 ` c3)[c7](c0 ` c5)))

} = {

  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c4), ((invg ` c1)` c5)‚àà c4, c1 ‚àà Grp, c5 ‚àà c4)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), c3 ‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà c4, c1 ‚àà Grp)
  ghmgrp1(c0, c1, c2)
  simp3(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), c3 ‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà c4)
  grpinvcl(c1, c5, c4, (invg ` c1))
  ghmlin(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, ((invg ` c1)` c5), (+ ` c1), (+ ` c2))
  oveq2d((c0 ` c3), (+ ` c2), (c0 `((invg ` c1)` c5)), ((invg ` c2)`(c0 ` c5)), (c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c4))
  3adant2(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), c3 ‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà c4, (c0 `((invg ` c1)` c5))=((invg ` c2)`(c0 ` c5)))
  ghminv(c0, c1, c2, c5, c4, (invg ` c1), (invg ` c2))
  3adant1(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), c3 ‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà c4, (c0 `(c3[c6]c5))=(c0 `(c3[(+ ` c1)]((invg ` c1)` c5))))
  fveq2d(c0, (c3[c6]c5), (c3[(+ ` c1)]((invg ` c1)` c5)), (c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c4))
  grpsubval(c3, c4, c5, c6, (+ ` c1), (invg ` c1), c1)
  eqid((+ ` c1))
  eqid((invg ` c1))
  syl((c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c4), ((c0 ` c3)[c7](c0 ` c5))=((c0 ` c3)[(+ ` c2)]((invg ` c2)`(c0 ` c5))), ((c0 ` c3)‚àà(Base ` c2)‚àß(c0 ` c5)‚àà(Base ` c2)))
  3impb(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), c3 ‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà c4, ((c0 ` c3)‚àà(Base ` c2)‚àß(c0 ` c5)‚àà(Base ` c2)))
  sylan(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), (c3 ‚àà c4 ‚àß c5 ‚àà c4), ((c0 ` c3)‚àà(Base ` c2)‚àß(c0 ` c5)‚àà(Base ` c2)), (c0 : c4 ‚Üí(Base ` c2)))

thm isghmd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c1))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cplusg, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c3, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c6, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl21anbrc(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c2, cgrp), wa(wf(c0, c3, c4), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c6, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))))
  jca(w0, wf(c0, c3, c4), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c6, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c3, c3, w0, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c6, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  isghm(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
}

thm ghmmhm(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cmhm, c2)))
} = {
  syl21anbrc(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cmhm, c2)), wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(c2, cmnd), w3a(wf(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c1), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(c0g, c2))))
  syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(c1, cgrp))
  ghmgrp1(c0, c1, c2)
  grpmnd(c1)
  syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c2, cmnd), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  ghmgrp2(c0, c1, c2)
  grpmnd(c2)
  3jca(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c1), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(c0g, c2)))
  ghmf(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  3expb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  ghmlin(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cplusg, c2))
  ghmid(c0, c1, c2, cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(c0g, c2))
  ismhm(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(c0g, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c2))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c1))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

  syl21anbrc(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), c0 ‚àà(c1[MndHom]c2), c1 ‚àà Mnd, c2 ‚àà Mnd, ((c0 :(Base ` c1)‚Üí(Base ` c2))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c1), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c1),(c0 `(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1))=((c0 ` hs0)[(+ ` c2)](c0 ` hs1))))‚àß(c0 `(0 ` c1))=(0 ` c2)))

  ghmf(c0, c1, c2, (Base ` c1), (Base ` c2))

  3expb(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c1), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c1), (c0 `(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1))=((c0 ` hs0)[(+ ` c2)](c0 ` hs1)))
  ghmlin(c0, c1, c2, hs0, (Base ` c1), hs1, (+ ` c1), (+ ` c2))
  ghmid(c0, c1, c2, (0 ` c1), (0 ` c2))
  ismhm(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, (Base ` c1), (Base ` c2), (+ ` c1), (+ ` c2), (0 ` c1), (0 ` c2))

blocks.name: ghmmhmb
blocks.content: Group homomorphisms and monoid homomorphisms coincide. (Thus, ` GrpHom ` is somewhat redundant, although its stronger reverse closure properties are sometimes useful.) (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ghmmhmb(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)), wceq(co(c0, cghm, c1), co(c0, cmhm, c1)))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, co(c0, cghm, c1), co(c0, cmhm, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)))
  impbid2(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cghm, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmhm, c1)))
  ghmmhm(cv(hs0), c0, c1)

blocks.name: ghmghmrn
blocks.content: A group homomorphism from ` G ` to ` H ` is also a group homomorphism from ` G ` to its image in ` H ` . (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 3-Mar-2008.) (Revised by AV, 26-Aug-2021.)

blocks.name: ghmco
blocks.content: The composition of group homomorphisms is a homomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: ghmima
blocks.content: The image of a subgroup under a homomorphism. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: ghmpreima
blocks.content: The inverse image of a subgroup under a homomorphism. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:

thm ghmeql(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cghm, c2))), wcel(cdm(cin(c0, c3)), cfv(csubg, c1)))

  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cghm, c2))), wcel(cdm(cin(c0, c3)), cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(cdm(cin(c0, c3)), cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wral(hs0, cdm(cin(c0, c3)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cv(hs0)), cdm(cin(c0, c3)))))

  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cghm, c2))), wral(hs0, cdm(cin(c0, c3)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cv(hs0)), cdm(cin(c0, c3)))), wral(hs0, crab(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cfv(c3, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cv(hs0)), crab(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cfv(c3, cv(hs1)))))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cghm, c2))), wral(hs0, crab(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cfv(c3, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cv(hs0)), crab(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cfv(c3, cv(hs1)))))), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c1), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), cv(hs0)), crab(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cfv(c3, cv(hs1))))))))

blocks.name: ghmnsgima
blocks.content: The image of a normal subgroup under a surjective homomorphism is normal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: ghmnsgpreima
blocks.content: The inverse image of a normal subgroup under a homomorphism is normal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: ghmker
blocks.content: The kernel of a homomorphism is a normal subgroup. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: ghmeqker
blocks.content: Two source points map to the same destination point under a group homomorphism iff their difference belongs to the kernel. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: conjnmz
blocks.content: A subgroup is unchanged under conjugation by an element of its normalizer. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jan-2015.)

thm conjnsg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí c0 = ran(c4))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(+ ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(-g ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶((c2[c5]s0)[c6]c2))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
} = {
  syl2an2r(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), c2 ‚àà c3, c0 = ran(c4), c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), c2 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c3,((hs0[c5]hs1)‚àà c0 ‚Üî(hs1[c5]hs0)‚àà c0))})
  nsgsubg(c0, c1)
  biimpar(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), c2 ‚àà c3, c2 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c3,((hs0[c5]hs1)‚àà c0 ‚Üî(hs1[c5]hs0)‚àà c0))})
  eleq2d(c2, { hs0 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c3,((hs0[c5]hs1)‚àà c0 ‚Üî(hs1[c5]hs0)‚àà c0))}, c3, c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1))
  simprbi(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), { hs0 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c3,((hs0[c5]hs1)‚àà c0 ‚Üî(hs1[c5]hs0)‚àà c0))} = c3, c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1))
  isnsg4(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, { hs0 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c3,((hs0[c5]hs1)‚àà c0 ‚Üî(hs1[c5]hs0)‚àà c0))}, c3, c5)
  conjnmz(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, { hs0 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c3,((hs0[c5]hs1)‚àà c0 ‚Üî(hs1[c5]hs0)‚àà c0))}, c4, c3, c5, c6)
  eqid({ hs0 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c3,((hs0[c5]hs1)‚àà c0 ‚Üî(hs1[c5]hs0)‚àà c0))})

  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.crab.s(s0, hs0, c3, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c3,((hs0[c5]hs1)‚àà c0 ‚Üî(hs1[c5]hs0)‚àà c0)))
  diff.wral.s(s0, hs1, c3, ((hs0[c5]hs1)‚àà c0 ‚Üî(hs1[c5]hs0)‚àà c0))

blocks.name: qusghm
blocks.content: If ` Y ` is a normal subgroup of ` G ` , then the "natural map" from elements to their cosets is a group homomorphism from ` G ` to ` G / Y ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2015.)

thm qusghm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  isghmd(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, c3, c4, cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cplusg, c3), wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)))

  3eqtr4rd(cfv(c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))), co(cec(cv(hs0), co(c1, cqg, c0)), cfv(cplusg, c3), cec(cv(hs1), co(c1, cqg, c0))), cec(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), co(c1, cqg, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4))))
  3expb(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wceq(co(cec(cv(hs0), co(c1, cqg, c0)), cfv(cplusg, c3), cec(cv(hs1), co(c1, cqg, c0))), cec(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), co(c1, cqg, c0))))
  qusadd(c0, c1, cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(cplusg, c1), c3)

  ad2antrl(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cec(cv(hs0), co(c1, cqg, c0))))
  fvmpt3i(s0, cv(hs0), c4, c2, cec(cv(hs0), co(c1, cqg, c0)), cec(cv(s0), co(c1, cqg, c0)))
  eceq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(c1, cqg, c0))

  fvmpt3i(s0, cv(hs1), c4, c2, cec(cv(hs1), co(c1, cqg, c0)), cec(cv(s0), co(c1, cqg, c0)))
  eceq1(cv(s0), cv(hs1), co(c1, cqg, c0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4))), wceq(cfv(c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), cec(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), co(c1, cqg, c0))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), c4))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), c4), wcel(c1, cgrp))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)))

thm qusghm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1)‚Üí c2 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(c1[/s](c1[~QG]c0))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶[s0](c1[~QG]c0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  isghmd(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, c3, c4, (Base ` c3), (+ ` c1), (+ ` c3), c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1))
  qusgrp(c0, c1, c3)
  fmptd(s0, c2, c4, (Base ` c3), [s0](c1[~QG]c0), c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1))
  quseccl(c0, c1, s0, c4, (Base ` c3), c3)
  eqid((Base ` c3))
  3eqtr4rd((c2 `(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)), ((c2 ` hs0)[(+ ` c3)](c2 ` hs1)), ([hs0](c1[~QG]c0)[(+ ` c3)][hs1](c1[~QG]c0)), [(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)](c1[~QG]c0), (c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c4)))
  3expb(c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1), hs0 ‚àà c4, hs1 ‚àà c4, ([hs0](c1[~QG]c0)[(+ ` c3)][hs1](c1[~QG]c0))=[(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)](c1[~QG]c0))
  qusadd(c0, c1, hs0, c4, hs1, (+ ` c3), (+ ` c1), c3)

  eceq1(s0, hs1, (c1[~QG]c0))
  syl((c0 ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c4)), (c2 `(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1))=[(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)](c1[~QG]c0), (hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)‚àà c4)

blocks.name: ghmpropd
blocks.content: Group homomorphism depends only on the group attributes of structures. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)

thm ghmpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cghm, c1), co(c2, cghm, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c4))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, co(c0, cghm, c1), co(c2, cghm, c3), w0)
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cghm, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cghm, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmhm, c1))), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c3, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmhm, c3))))
  anbi12d(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmhm, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c3, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmhm, c3)))
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c3, cgrp))
  grppropd(s0, s1, c0, c2, c4, w0)
  grppropd(s0, s1, c1, c3, c5, w0)
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmhm, c1), co(c2, cmhm, c3), w0)
  mhmpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  biadanii(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cghm, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmhm, c1)))
  jca(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cghm, c1)), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp))
  ghmgrp1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  ghmgrp2(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), co(c0, cghm, c1), co(c0, cmhm, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)))
  ghmmhmb(c0, c1)
  biadanii(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cghm, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c3, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmhm, c3)))
  jca(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cghm, c3)), wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c3, cgrp))
  ghmgrp1(cv(hs0), c2, c3)
  ghmgrp2(cv(hs0), c2, c3)
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), co(c2, cghm, c3), co(c2, cmhm, c3), wa(wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c3, cgrp)))
  ghmmhmb(c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cghm, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, cghm, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

thm ghmpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[GrpHom]c1)=(c2[GrpHom]c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 =(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 =(Base ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 =(Base ` c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 =(Base ` c3))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c4))‚Üí(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c2)]s1))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c5 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c5))‚Üí(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c3)]s1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, (c0[GrpHom]c1), (c2[GrpHom]c3), w0)
  3bitr4g(w0, hs0 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c1), hs0 ‚àà(c2[GrpHom]c3), ((c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà Grp)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c0[MndHom]c1)), ((c2 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c3 ‚àà Grp)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c2[MndHom]c3)))
  anbi12d(w0, (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà Grp), hs0 ‚àà(c0[MndHom]c1), (c2 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c3 ‚àà Grp), hs0 ‚àà(c2[MndHom]c3))
  anbi12d(w0, c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà Grp, c2 ‚àà Grp, c3 ‚àà Grp)
  grppropd(s0, s1, c0, c2, c4, w0)
  grppropd(s0, s1, c1, c3, c5, w0)
  eleq2d(hs0, (c0[MndHom]c1), (c2[MndHom]c3), w0)
  mhmpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  biadanii(hs0 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c1), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà Grp), hs0 ‚àà(c0[MndHom]c1))
  jca(hs0 ‚àà(c0[GrpHom]c1), c0 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà Grp)
  ghmgrp1(hs0, c0, c1)
  ghmgrp2(hs0, c0, c1)
  eleq2d(hs0, (c0[GrpHom]c1), (c0[MndHom]c1), (c0 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c1 ‚àà Grp))
  ghmmhmb(c0, c1)
  biadanii(hs0 ‚àà(c2[GrpHom]c3), (c2 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c3 ‚àà Grp), hs0 ‚àà(c2[MndHom]c3))
  jca(hs0 ‚àà(c2[GrpHom]c3), c2 ‚àà Grp, c3 ‚àà Grp)
  ghmgrp1(hs0, c2, c3)
  ghmgrp2(hs0, c2, c3)
  eleq2d(hs0, (c2[GrpHom]c3), (c2[MndHom]c3), (c2 ‚àà Grp ‚àß c3 ‚àà Grp))
  ghmmhmb(c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[GrpHom]c1))
  diff.hs0.c((c2[GrpHom]c3))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
